headline.main: U.S. GIVES SOVIET TECHNICAL HELP; Experts Staying to Instruct on Use and Maintenance of Materiel, Harriman Says

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Oct. 2 -- Arrangements have already been made to speed up and amplify United States and British deliveries of war materials to Russia, and a staff of United States experts will remain here to supervise maintenance of United States-made equipment and give instruction in its use.
abstract: Harriman and Beaverbrook announce memo signing, joint press conf; tech staffs to remain; personal lrs from Roosevelt and Churchill delivered to Stalin; Stalin entertains mission staffs
